Did you like Duck Hunt on the NES? Do you like to play shooting games on the iPhone and iPad? Then Longbow Birdy is the game for you! Meet Birdy, a little bird just flying around in the sky, dodging the arrows you shoot at him. Hit Birdy with your arrow to make him fall down, and score points! Shoot as many Birdy`s out of the sky to clear the level. Each level becomes harder and more challenging… To what level can you get?

Download Longbow Birdy today while its FREE!
